-------------------------------------------
U2 Best Of 2000-2010 & B-Sides (CD Edition)
-------------------------------------------


Why is this a thing?

In 1998 and 2002, U2 released two compilations of 'Best Of' albums but never followed through to release a follow up (and there remains no plans tabled for the future). As such, I've undertaken to correct this great musical injustice under the U2 Revisited banner. 

There are two versions: this extended edition for your mp3 players and a CD edition that'll actually fit on 2 cds. Thus, there will be two separate torrents.

Each edition will contain both a main 'disc' of A-sides and a second one of B-sides and remixes. 

Careful consideration was made to best represent all the albums fairly and offer a worthy summation of U2's output in that decade. While the Extended Edition is more ideal, the slimmed down CD Edition must, alas, be left with only the most crucial tracks. 


Whichever edition you choose, I hope you enjoy The Best Of 2000-2010 & B-Sides and, *please*, send your thoughts to <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="5e0b6c0c3b28372d372a3b3a1e333f3732703d3133">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
